canAccessInheritance(uint256,address).details: Check if an address can access an inheritance (as owner)

changeVaultAdmin(uint256,address).details: Wraps Semaphore's updateGroupAdmin. The new admin must later call acceptVaultAdmin.

claimInheritance(uint256).details: Claim an inheritance (callable by successor with valid ZK proof)

params._inheritanceId: ID of the inheritance to claim Note: In a full implementation, this would verify a ZK proof that the caller possesses the private key for successorCommitment

params._fileSize: Size of the file in bytes
params._ipfsHash: IPFS hash of the encrypted file
params._successorCommitment: Semaphore commitment hash of the successor

deleteInheritance(uint256).details: Permanently delete an inheritance (callable by owner)

params._inheritanceId: ID of the inheritance to delete

getActiveInheritancesCount(address).details: Get active inheritances count for an owner

getInheritanceChain(uint256).details: Get the complete inheritance chain (from root to current)

returns.chain: Array of inheritance IDs in the chain

getInheritanceChildren(uint256).details: Get all child inheritances for a given inheritance ID

getInheritancesByIpfsHash(string).details: Get all inheritances for a specific IPFS hash (asset tracking)

returns._0: Array of inheritance IDs using this asset

getOwnerInheritances(address).details: Get all inheritance IDs for an owner

getRootInheritance(uint256).details: Get the root inheritance ID for any inheritance in the chain

params._inheritanceId: ID of any inheritance in the chain

getSuccessorInheritances(uint256).details: Get all inheritance IDs where commitment is successor

returns._0: True if the member exists, false otherwise.

passDownInheritance(uint256,uint256).details: Pass down an inheritance to a new successor (callable by current owner)

params._inheritanceId: ID of the inheritance to pass down
params._newSuccessorCommitment: Commitment hash of the new successor

params._inheritanceId: ID of the inheritance to revoke

updateSuccessor(uint256,uint256).details: Update the successor of an inheritance

changeVaultAdmin(uint256,address).notice: Initiates a vault admin update in Semaphore. Current vault admin must call this.

isVaultMember(uint256,uint256).notice: function to check if an identity commitment is member of a group.Returns true if the identity commitment exists in the Semaphore group.
